sentences.en: A sound mind is inseparable from a sound body.
sentences.cn: 健全的精神是与健康的身体不可分割的.

sentences.en: Brightness and color are inseparable in color films.
sentences.cn: 彩色胶片上的亮度和颜色是不可分割的.

sentences.en: For the ancient Mexicans, life and death were inseparable, two halves of the same whole.
sentences.cn: 对古代墨西哥人来说，生与死是同一整体不可分割的两个部分。

sentences.en: Jane and Sarah soon became inseparable companions.
sentences.cn: 简与萨拉很快就形影不离了。

sentences.en: Our economic fortunes are inseparable from those of Europe.
sentences.cn: 我们的经济命运和欧洲息息相关。

sentences.en: Our moral convictions must arm us to face the ambiguity inseparable from the long haul.
sentences.cn: 我们的道德信念必须使我们武装起来,正视同持久争夺不可分割地联系在一起的模棱两可现象.

sentences.en: Planning and control are especially inseparable -- the Siamese twins of management.
sentences.cn: 规划和控制象管理的双胞胎一样是特别分不开的.
她和克里斯廷形影不离。

sentences.en: The army and the people are as inseparable as fish and water.
The reason why children are cheap furniture, with its well - chic design inseparable.
sentences.cn: 儿童家具之所以价格不菲, 与其精心别致的设计密不可分.

sentences.en: The three aspects are integrated, equally important and inseparable.
sentences.cn: 这三个方面互为联系, 同等重要,不可分割.

sentences.en: The two girls are inseparable friends.
sentences.cn: 这两个女孩是形影不离的朋友.

sentences.en: They are inseparable aspects of the natural world.
sentences.cn: 在自然界中它们是不可分割的方面.

sentences.en: They both inseparable all day, just like the pro - brother.
sentences.cn: 他们俩整天形影不离, 就像亲兄弟一样.

sentences.en: What unites them is becoming stronger and stronger and is making them wellnigh inseparable.
sentences.cn: 把他们结合起来的力量越来越强,这就使得他们难解难分了.

trans.tran_cn: 不可分的，分不开的，不能分离的
trans.tran_en: things that are inseparable cannot be separated or cannot be considered separately

trans.tran_cn: 不可分离的事物；形影不离的朋友
